entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as someone who called Harry's name softly up the stairs around lunchtime. (Excerpt: 'Weasley calling his name softly up the stairs around lunchtime')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who re-treated farther upstairs and ignored Weasley's call. (Excerpt: 'he re-treated farther upstairs and ignored her.')

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is mentioned as someone who might have come to visit Harry, but it's actually Hermione. (Excerpt: 'Assuming that Mundungus or some other Order member had come to call')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who came to visit Harry and rang the doorbell. (Excerpt: 'I know you’re in there,” said Hermione’s voice.')

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is mentioned as a hippogriff that Harry is hiding with. (Excerpt: 'where he was hiding, trying to ignore how hungry he felt as he fed Buckbeak dead rats')

entities.name: mrs black
entities.description: Mrs Black is mentioned as someone who started screaming again when the doorbell rang. (Excerpt: 'It was around six o’clock in the evening that the doorbell rang and Mrs. Black started screaming agai n')

relationships.description: Weasley called Harry's name softly up the stairs around lunchtime. (Excerpt: 'Weasley calling his name softly up the stairs around lunchtime')
Hermione came to visit Harry and rang the doorbell. (Excerpt: 'I know you’re in there,” said Hermione’s voice.')
Harry was hiding with Buckbeak. (Excerpt: 'where he was hiding, trying to ignore how hungry he felt as he fed Buckbeak dead rats')
